snippet: The president invited opinion makers to a dinner, where he spoke about his plans for confronting the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
abstract: Pres Obama plays host at White House dinner for bipartisan group of prominent foreign policy experts, in effort to win over elite opinion before speech to nation on his plans for confronting the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.
lead_paragraph: The president invited opinion makers to a dinner, where he spoke about his plans for confronting the Islamic State in Iraq and Syria.

headline.main: Obama Hosts Foreign Policy Experts, Laying Groundwork for Speech on ISIS
headline.print_headline: Obama Hosts Foreign Policy Experts, Laying Groundwork for Speech on ISIS

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations
